title: mojo.core.BadRequest.FieldViolation
description: A type type used to describe a single bad request field.

description.title: mojo.core.String
description.description: A description of why the request element is bad.

field.title: mojo.core.String
field.description:
A path leading to a field in the request body. The value will be a
sequence of dot-separated identifiers that identify a protocol buffer
field. E.g., "field_violations.field" would identify this field.
